name: Causese Anchors
description: This is a required framework that helps position and organize the other aura packs. Install this one first!

name: The War Within Raid Auras
description: A comprehensive pack of auras for all raid encounters in The War Within.

name: The War Within Dungeon Auras
description: A collection of essential auras for Mythic+ and Delve dungeons in The War Within.
